short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that plays a song when your HTTP server is down.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Makes crash recovery fun! It's great for use in the office and terribly easy to setup.

How to use it:

    1) go to "Options"
    2) fill in the URL you want to monitor
    3) click the toolbar icon and choose "Start"
    4) Done!

You can optionally change the song URL and polling interval.
